name: Endlings and Ending
description:
IMPORTANT: Do not interact directly with computer on second level. It will crash the game.

You can use items on other items in your inventory and you can use items on characters! (full walkthrough bellow)

CONTROLS

Right Click: Cycle Action

Left Click: Use Action

TAB: Inventory

Esc: Exit out of Inventory/Menu

WALK THROUGH

  1. Pick up System Report and Mechanical Calendar
  2. In inventory, click on either System Report or Mechanical Calendar, then use it to click on the other one. You will receive a Password
  3. Click and Password and exit inventory, click the password to the door frame on the far right.
  4. Interact with door to walk through
  5. DO NOT INTERACT DIRECTLY WITH COMPUTER (I goofed, it will crash the game)
  6. You can get past PAT one of two ways
    1.  Way 1
      1. Pick up Illogical Commands and ID Card
      2. In inventory, click ID Card to the Mechanical Calendar (this will give you Evidence of Owner Death)
      3. Click Illogical Commands onto PAT  then, Evidence of Owner Death. 
      4. Interact with door next to PAT to move on
    2. Way 2
      1. Pick up Pats Owner Recording
      2. Click Pats Owner Recording to the Computer(The Recording will now be)
      3. Click the altered recording to PAT
      4. Interact with door next to PAT
  7. (if you can move in the next room just interact with the first door to enter)
  8. Again two ways
    1. Way 1
      1. Go into second door
      2. Pick up Upgrade Form
      3. Go back to hallway
      4. Go into first door
      5. Click Upgrade form onto Chapi (receive measurer)
      6. Go back to hallway
      7. enter fourth door way
      8. click measurer to box of pins (receive pin)
      9. go back to hallway
      10. click pin to door frame on far right
      11. interact with door to move on
    2. Way 2 is just like 1 only enter the third door and pick up the systems failure report
  9. (it might put you on the right side of the next room by mistake)
  10. Similar to before
  11. Pick up Art
  12. Interact with Cubbies (receive note)
  13. Talk with Emit to give it both those items
  14. (back in the first room) use key inventory on locker
